actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Edwardo Reyes, Dianelita Reyes, and their children, Susy Damaris, Reyes, Danny Daniel Reyes, and Brandon Neil Reyes.

summary.text: Declares Edwardo Reyes, Dianelita Reyes, and their children, Susy Damaris Reyes, Danny Daniel Reyes, and Brandon Neil Reyes, to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act upon payment of the required visa fees.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Edwardo Reyes, Dianelita Reyes, and their children, Susy Damaris, Reyes, Danny Daniel Reyes, and Brandon Neil Reyes.
